mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, MEMBER_NM, TEACHER_IMG MEMBER_IMG, RECENT_CHAT_CONTENT(C.CHAT_ROOM_NO) RECENT_CHAT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(RECENT_MSG_DT(C.CHAT_ROOM_NO), 'MM"월"DD"일" HH24:MI') RECENT_MSG_DT FROM CHAT_ROOM C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.TEACHER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TEACHER T ON(C.TEACHER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
